PathOfBuilding.Notes:
!!! Gems !!!
Caustic Arrow Setup
* Caustic Arrow + Pierce + Void Manipulation (lvl 8) + Vicious Projectiles (lvl 18) + Damage on Full Life (lvl 18) + Swift Affliction (lvl 31)
* Level of your Caustic Arrow & Toxic Rain matters quite a bit for damage so buy a couple of daggers for your off-hand weapons and level up those gems and vaal them once they're level 20. Quality doesn't do much so just try getting a level 21 gem.
* Pierce [Drop it later on when you get your Penetrating Arrow Quiver (Starts dropping at 36+ level zones)] - Replace it with Conc Effect for endgame.
* Void Manipulation (Drop this for a lvl4 Empower when you can for a huge damage boost)
Toxic Rain Setup
* Its pretty much the same setup, just don't use Pierce and use Mirage Archer instead of Conc Effect.
! I'd recommend completing the first quest in A6 (Fallen From Grace) to get access to all gems and try & get all the gems as fast as possible !
!!! Weapon Options !!!
Silverbranch * This is a +1 Bow that will be pretty cheap early league so you can probably find & buy one as you are leveling.
Silverbough * You can upgrade your Silverbranch with the " The Silverwood " prophecy to get a Silverbough which is a +2 Bow.
Crafting a +2, 6-Link Bow * You can look for " The Porcupine " cards which will give you a 6-Link Short Bow. This bow will be ilvl 50 so we can't craft +3 on it however, if you get one of these bows you can use a Shrieking Essence of Dread to get a guarenteed +2 which will carry you through most of the content.
Crafting a +3, 6-Link Bow * You can look for " Imperial Legacy " cards which will give you a 6-Link Imperial Bow. This bow will be ilvl 100 so you can craft +3 fairly easily with the following fossils.
Metallic + Corroded + Prismatic * Combination of these fossils will block alotof undesired mods and make it very easy for you to get a +3 bow. Shouldn't take more than a couple tries.
!!! Rest of the gear !!!
* You can farm a Tabula Rasa in Blood Aqueducts early on for an easy 6-Link.
* Craft your Gloves,Quiver,Amulet with Aberrant Fossils. Aberrant Fossils will give you the Chaos Damage Over Time Multiplier.
* Craft your Helmet with Aberrant Fossils. Aberrant Fossils will give you the Nearby enemies have -9% Chaos Resistance Mod.
* Craft your Rings with Essence of Envy for the Increased Chaos Damage mod.
* Rest of your gear will be typical rare gear with life & resistances.
